parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value:
={{ 'Extract key information from this resume:

' + $json.resume_text + '

Provide a structured analysis including:
1. Skills (technical and soft)
2. Years of experience
3. Education
4. Previous roles
5. Key achievements

Format as JSON.' }}

parameters.values: ={{ $('Validate Input').item.json.candidate_name }},={{ $('Validate Input').item.json.job_id }},={{ $('Validate Input').item.json.resume_text }},={{ JSON.stringify($json.response) }},={{ $json.response.skills ? JSON.stringify($json.response.skills) : '[]' }},={{ $json.response.experience_years || 0 }},={{ $json.response.education || 'Not specified' }},={{ $('Validate Input').item.json.timestamp }}

parameters.name: points
parameters.value: ={{ [{ id: $('Store in Database').item.json.id, vector: $json.embedding, payload: { candidate_name: $('Validate Input').item.json.candidate_name, job_id: $('Validate Input').item.json.job_id, skills: $('Extract Resume Info').item.json.response.skills || [] } }] }}
